channel.title: Cathode Ray Dude - CRD
channel.description:
Video cameras, computer mice, and the 2000s in general are my usual topics. I'm sure I'll waver eventually.
I hate capitalism and I'm not here to get sponsorships, I just want to share what I'm up to for your entertainment and education.
On my side channel (below) I sometimes upload smaller clips, and I do streams on some weekends.

item.title: Xoftware: Unix apps on Windows
item.description:
It's amazing how hard it is to make a software review interesting. Good luck!
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/cathoderaydude Tip me: https://ko-fi.com/cathoderaydude
Chapters: 00:00:00 Intro 00:01:37 History of X-Windows 00:11:50 Netmanage and Chameleon 00:16:47 Conventional X 00:23:47 Basic X functionality 00:29:53 Remote launchers 00:34:07 NFS sharing 00:35:27 Keyboard/mouse settings 00:38:00 Multi window mode 00:43:50 Single window mode 00:45:58 Motif tangent 00:49:18 Single window mode part 2 00:50:40 X Display Manager 00:58:09 Color depth issues 01:02:18 Compatibility issues 01:06:57 Outro

item.title: Quick Start, Ep 8: A Trio Of Trios
item.description:
I wanted to call this "Trio And Error" but not enough people know their early 80s german alt-pop bands.
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/cathoderaydude Tip me: https://ko-fi.com/cathoderaydude
Chapters: 0:00:00 Intro 0:02:23 Meet the Trio 0:09:42 The Reveal 0:13:16 The Concept 0:15:45 Hardware features 0:19:56 Tablet tour 0:35:55 Interop features 0:42:27 Why? 0:45:50 Hardware tour 0:49:49 The Great Irony 0:53:42 Three Titans Clash 1:02:27 Trio In Summary 1:05:45 Outro
